rules.natural: Provided that medical personnel perform CPR training, a government agency issues a disaster declaration.
Whenever medical personnel apply tourniquet training, a government agency issues a disaster declaration.
If the emergency coordinator coordinates evacuation, then they secure the evacuation route.
Under the condition that the emergency coordinator coordinates evacuation, they mobilize evacuation vehicles.
Whenever the emergency coordinator mobilizes evacuation vehicles, it is not the case that they secure the evacuation route.
If the disaster team has emergency power, then whenever a government agency does not issue a disaster declaration, the disaster team establishes a field kitchen.
Provided that the hazardous materials team conducts chemical spill response, the disaster team does not experience a power outage.
Either the hazardous materials team conducts chemical spill response or they conduct biological containment response.
Either the emergency coordinator operates an unmanned aerial vehicle, or either the medical team requires a field hospital or a government agency issues a disaster declaration.

Either the engineering team performs structural damage assessment, or if the hazardous materials team conducts biological containment response, then the disaster team does not experience a power outage.
Either the engineering team performs structural reinforcement, or if the engineering team conducts building safety inspection, then it is not the case that they perform structural damage assessment.

If the meteorological team issues a severe weather forecast, then under the condition that the emergency coordinator deploys a communication system, whenever it is not the case that if a government agency does not issue a disaster declaration then the disaster team does not access supplies, the medical team treats casualties.
Provided that the emergency coordinator activates flood barriers, if the meteorological team does not issue a severe weather forecast, then the emergency coordinator cancels the evacuation drill.
Either the emergency coordinator activates flood barriers or they issue a flash flood warning.

If the meteorological team predicts the flood peak, then whenever the emergency coordinator issues a flash flood warning, if the meteorological team does not issue a severe weather forecast, then the emergency coordinator cancels the evacuation drill.
Provided that the meteorological team tracks the storm system, they predict the flood peak.
If the meteorological team continues monitoring, then it is not the case that they terminate monitoring.
Under the condition that the emergency coordinator halts evacuation protocol, it is not the case that they coordinate evacuation.
Either the emergency coordinator resumes evacuation protocol or they halt evacuation protocol.
Whenever the disaster team distributes emergency supplies, they establish a field kitchen.

If the hazardous materials team responds to a hazardous material incident, then whenever it is not the case that if it is not the case that if a government agency does not issue a disaster declaration then the disaster team distributes emergency supplies, then the disaster team does not initiate the supply chain, the disaster team coordinates supply delivery.
Provided that the hazardous materials team performs chemical leak containment, they respond to a hazardous material incident.
Either the medical team administers antiseptic or if the emergency coordinator operates an unmanned aerial vehicle, then the unmanned aerial vehicle surveys the damaged area.
Either the hazardous materials team conducts radiation monitoring response or they perform chemical leak containment.
Under the condition that the medical team treats casualties, they establish a triage area.
Either the emergency coordinator deploys a communication system or they activate a satellite network.

Provided that the emergency coordinator activates a satellite network, under the condition that it is not the case that if a government agency does not issue a disaster declaration then the disaster team does not access supplies, the medical team treats casualties.
If it is not the case that either medical personnel perform CPR training or they apply tourniquet training, then the emergency coordinator coordinates evacuation.
Provided that it is not the case that if the meteorological team monitors river levels then they track the storm system, the meteorological team terminates monitoring.

If it is not the case that if the emergency coordinator deploys a communication system then under the condition that it is not the case that if a government agency does not issue a disaster declaration then the disaster team does not access supplies, the medical team treats casualties, then the emergency coordinator reports equipment failure.

Under the condition that it is not the case that if the emergency coordinator deploys a communication system then whenever it is not the case that if a government agency does not issue a disaster declaration then the disaster team does not access supplies, the medical team treats casualties, it is not the case that the emergency coordinator reports equipment failure.

If it is not the case that if it is not the case that if a government agency does not issue a disaster declaration then the disaster team distributes emergency supplies, then the disaster team does not initiate the supply chain, then it is not the case that the disaster team coordinates supply delivery.
Provided that it is not the case that if a government agency does not issue a disaster declaration then the disaster team distributes emergency supplies, the disaster team initiates the supply chain.
If the disaster team does not have emergency power, then they experience a power outage.
If the meteorological team does not issue a severe weather forecast, then it is not the case that the emergency coordinator cancels the evacuation drill.
If a government agency does not issue a disaster declaration, then the disaster team accesses supplies.

(A1 ∨ G).natural: Either the medical team requires a field hospital or a government agency issues a disaster declaration.

(A11 → G).natural: Provided that medical personnel perform CPR training, a government agency issues a disaster declaration.

(A11 ∨ A12).natural: Either medical personnel perform CPR training or they apply tourniquet training.

(A12 → G).natural: Whenever medical personnel apply tourniquet training, a government agency issues a disaster declaration.

(A13 → A14).natural: If the emergency coordinator coordinates evacuation, then they secure the evacuation route.

(A13 → ¬A14).natural: If the emergency coordinator coordinates evacuation, then it is not the case that they secure the evacuation route.

(A15 → ¬A14).natural: Whenever the emergency coordinator mobilizes evacuation vehicles, it is not the case that they secure the evacuation route.
